ignoreHideTooltip.name: Ignore Hide Tooltip
ignoreHideTooltip.description: When enabled the tooltip of an item will even show up when the item has the 'Hide Tooltip' component.

globalColor.name: Global Color
globalColor.description: When enabled the color in each setting will be ignored and this one will be used instead.

textColor.name: Color
textColor.description: The color for every tooltip when 'Global Color' is enabled.

itemDurability.name: Item Durability
itemDurability.description: Shows the durability of an item when advanced tooltip is turned off.

textColor.name: Color
textColor.description: The color for 'Item Durability' when 'Global Color' is disabled.

durabilityType.name: Durability Type
durabilityType.description:
Display type for the item durability.

Vanilla: Normal Minecraft durability format.
Percentage: Display the durability in percentage.
Combined: Display Minecraft format and percentage.

anvilUsages.name: Anvil Uses
anvilUsages.description: Displays the amount of anvils uses of an item in its tooltip.

textColor.name: Color
textColor.description: The color for 'Anvil Uses' when 'Global Color' is disabled.

discSignalStrength.name: Disc Signal Strength
discSignalStrength.description: Displays the redstone strength of the disc.

textColor.name: Color
textColor.description: The color for 'Disc Signal Strength' when 'Global Color' is disabled.

commandBlockCommand.name: Command Block Command
commandBlockCommand.description: When the command block was saved with nbt data, it will display the saved command.

textColor.name: Color
textColor.description: The color for 'Command Block Command' when 'Global Color' is disabled.

burnDuration.name: Burn Duration
burnDuration.description: Display the furnace burn duration of an item.

textColor.name: Color
textColor.description: The color for 'Burn Duration' when 'Global Color' is disabled.

burnDurationTimeUnit.name: Time Unit
burnDurationTimeUnit.description:
Time Unit used to display item burn duration.

Ticks: Display in ticks.
Seconds: Display in seconds.
Minutes: Display in minutes and seconds.

miningLevel.name: Mining Level
miningLevel.description: Display the mining level of a tool.

textColor.name: Color
textColor.description: The color for 'Mining Level' when 'Global Color' is disabled.

miningSpeed.name: Mining Speed
miningSpeed.description: Display the mining speed of a tool.

textColor.name: Color
textColor.description: The color for 'Mining Speed' when 'Global Color' is disabled.

applyEnchantments.name: Apply Enchantments
applyEnchantments.description: When enabled will add the speed of the current efficiency when available.

clockTime.name: Clock Time
clockTime.description: Display the current world time in the tooltip of a clock.

textColor.name: Color
textColor.description: The color for 'Clock Time' when 'Global Color' is disabled.

format24Hours.name: 24h Format
format24Hours.description: When enabled use 24h Format instead of the 12h Format.

displayComponent.name: Item Data
displayComponent.description:
Allows you to display the item data of an item.

<= 1.20.4: Displays NBT data of an item stack.
>= 1.20.5: Displays components of an item stack.

textColor.name: Color
textColor.description: The color for 'Item Data' when 'Global Color' is disabled.

toggleDisplayItemData.name: Toggle 'Item Data'
toggleDisplayItemData.description::
When enabled the key for 'Show Item Data' will toggle the tooltip.
When disabled the tooltip will be shown as long as 'Show Item Data' key is pressed.

displayItemData.name: Show Item Data
displayItemData.description: Key to toggle or show the 'Item Data'.

printWithNbtArrayData.name: Show NBT Array Data
printWithNbtArrayData.description: Display values inside of an NBT array.

expandComponents.name: Expand Components
expandComponents.description: Expand lists/objects of a component when they are collapsed.

signText.name: Sign Text Lines
signText.description: When enabled shows the lines of an sign, if nbt/component data is saved.

textColor.name: Color
textColor.description: The color for 'Sign Text Lines' when 'Global Color' is disabled.

mapDecoration.name: Explorer Map Coordinates
mapDecoration.description: Displays the coordinates of a map. For example the location of a mansion or ocean monument.

textColor.name: Color
textColor.description: The color for 'Explorer Map Coordinates' when 'Global Color' is disabled.

suspiciousStewEffect.name: Suspicious Stew Effect
suspiciousStewEffect.description: Displays the effect type and duration of a suspicious stew.

textColor.name: Color
textColor.description: The color for 'Suspicious Stew Effect' when 'Global Color' is disabled.

saturationIcons.name: Saturation Level Icons
saturationIcons.description: Display the saturation of an item when enabled.

saturationType.name: Saturation Type
saturationType.description:
Displays the saturation of a food item in its tooltip.

Current: Displays the level of saturation reached after eating.
Maximum: Displays the maximum possible saturation level of a food.

nutritionIcons.name: Food Level Icons
nutritionIcons.description: Displays the nutrition of a food item in its tooltip.

armorIcons.name: Armor Icons
armorIcons.description: Displays the armor bars of a armor item in its tooltip.
